document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">One </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Day </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">there </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Series </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Termed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Thanksgiving </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Day </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Celebrated </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">part </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Table </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Part, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Memory </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Neither </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Patriarch </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">nor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Pussy </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">dissect </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Play </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Seems </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Hooded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">thinking </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Reflex </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Holiday </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">there </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">been </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">sharp </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Subtraction </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">From </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">early </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Sum </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Acre </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Caption </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">once </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Room </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">mention, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">small </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Pebble </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Wrinkled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">any </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Sea, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Unto </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Such, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">such </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Assembly, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Twere </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Thanksgiving </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Day. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: One day is there of the series
